name: Hilton Garden Inn Albany Airport

reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton during a visit to Union College. Their price was very reasonable, the staff was friendly, The room was very clean. The only suggestion i would give them is to be able to provide full size pillows, which they don't offer.
reviews.title: College visit

reviews.text: This hotel is incredibly convenient for anyone needing to be close to the airport without feeling like you are AT the airport, as it is set off in a wooded area. The staff were very friendly, helpful and welcoming. When we discovered a soiled sheet on one of the beds, the situation was immediately addressed and we were given a complimentary breakfast the next morning. The breakfast was fresh and made to order. For those in our party who arrived late at night and flew out early in the morning, the shuttle was very convenient. If I ever return to the area, I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Overall, a good experience

reviews.text: This hotel is our back-up when the Troy HGI is full. Nothing to complain about. Clean, well-run, fully staffed and equiped. Easy to get back on the Thruway.
reviews.title: Very professional

reviews.text: Would certainly recommend. Nice safe location, great for running/walking.
reviews.title: Hilton Garden Inn Albany Airport

reviews.text: Very clean, friendly staff, comfortable rooms. Would definitely stay here again. Very Peaceful location. Although its next to the airport, I never heard any planes. Short 2 min drive to wolff rd where many restaurants are.
reviews.title: Our weekend stay

reviews.text: I have stayed at this property twice while visiting Union College. It is extremely convenient to the airport and only a 15 minute drive to the school. The lobby is nicely decorated and very inviting. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. I am not a big fan of the adjustable firmness bed. I was never able to get the right comfort level, however I did not have this problem the first time I stayed, so maybe I had a faulty bed this time. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Convenient to airport, nice hotel, friendly staff

reviews.text: booked the Hotel because it was close to the airport It turned out to be a great place to stay!! I thought the hotel staff was excellent. I would definitely stay there again. It was excellent using the Albany Airport too. It was a great better than flying into New York City.
reviews.title: Albany Hilton Garden Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed for one night while in Albany. Very clean, and so quiet. We sleep on a S.A.T. Bed at home so we were thrilled to see them here. The hotel is quite new looking and very well kept. The front desk staff was very friendly and very helpful. Loved having complimentary coffee in the lobby that was strong and hot!!! We will definitely go back!!!
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay!

reviews.text: I spent one night at the Hilton Garden Inn as I had an early flight out of Albany and found the property very nice. I had a king room on the top floor, and it was very quiet - never heard anyone in the hallways or in the rooms adjacent to mine. I was a little worried I would spend a lot of time waiting for elevators as one of the two was out of service, but never had an issue. Room was standard for HGI, with a small microwave and refrigerator along with a flat screen TV and good work area. The one thing I still dislike about HGI is the beds - I can never find a great adjustment that works for me, and often wake up at night with a stiff back. The bathroom also felt a little tight with only one sink in the vanity, but the adjustable shower head was great compared to most hotels.
reviews.title: Quiet, convenient to airport

reviews.text: Workout room was a little small and attached to the pool, which left it extremely warm. If I were more familiar with the area I would have went outside to run as it would have been cooler. Pool and hot tub were nice, and the area was quiet as there were no kids around when I was down there. I also enjoyed the bar / restaurant, which had a relatively deep menu and reasonable prices. Was happy to see a couple local beers on the menu, as I like to try them whenever I travel. I did not get a chance to try the breakfast as my flight was early, but the seating area looked spacious and clean.
reviews.title: Great Hotel to stay !! You need to stay this hotel to enjoy their service

reviews.text: For a hotel very near an airport, you can't get a quieter stay. Also remember the sleep number beds so you can pick the mattress firmness. Stayed here for business and pleasure. Easy access from the highway. They offer shuttle service to nearby restaurants, staff are helpful. Most recently we were invited to an early evening reception in email prior to our arrival. There are some outdoor seats and tables for relaxing outside.
reviews.title: Quiet and dependable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very Pleasant Accommodations
reviews.title: Keeps Getting Better With Each Year

reviews.text: We have been staying here for many years now and have watched the lovely improvements they have incorporated.
reviews.title: Clean , spacious, great food, great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The décor is very inviting in the lobby. Rooms are comfortable and clean. Their dining room is nice and small and we have been always happy with what we have selected. And even the staff has become more professional. A very nice improvement over the years.
reviews.title: Pretty much what you'd expect

reviews.text: I would definitely stay again. Very friendly and accommodating. My family stayed during surgery at st peters hospital, it was a great place for me to rest on discharge as well. Food is delicious, even my picky son loved the food.
reviews.title: nice clean comfortable

reviews.text: Stayed here late for a night while on a business trip. Check in was very quick. Room was very clean. Decent burger and drinks at the bar. Nice lobby area with the fireplace etc. All in all, good business hotel close to the airport. No complaints.
reviews.title: Great Business Hotel/Convenient to Airport

reviews.text: I believe in reviewing hotels relative to expectations for a particular chain or property. This is the nicest, most modern and clean HGI that I have ever stayed in. The staff is incredibly attentive. The atmosphere is great, rooms very clean and the restaurant with the special order grill option for breakfast is an unexpected surprise. If you need to be near the airport, this is a great option. We stayed here during a Union Parents Weekend - it's about 8 minutes away.
reviews.title: Great property within this chain

reviews.text: Booked a " reverse" park and fly package and turned out to be our best idea. Parked the vehicle here and the hotel shuttled us to the airport terminal as soon as we were ready. Flew out for the week and when we returned made a quick phone call and the shuttle was there to bring us back to the hotel within 5 minutes or making the phone call. Check right into the hotel and the hotel gave us a late checkout without blinking an eye. Rooms were clean and upto date. Had a mini fridge and microwave in room. Also the bed was a air select bed. The only con was the bathroom was quite small but don't spend much time there anyhow. Will do again when traveling out of the Albany airport.
reviews.title: Best idea to date after long travel week.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Speedy and friendly check-in. Found luggage cart for us when there where none at door. Recognized our profile of preferences ( high floor, away from elevator ). Clean and spacious room with everything as expected ( all items such as coffee maker, microwave and small refrigerator) in working order. Headed down to the work-out room and heated pool and whirl pool immediately after check in. After a quick workout and a short stay in whirl pool to help the kinks from 6 hrs in car, we decided to try room service. Wow! Could not believe the quality of preparation and taste of thick lamp chops as well.as the pork chop. Enjoyed a glass of Malbec and a wonderful dinner without leaving our room. Like I said ... This HGI has it all and am so appreciative of all the extra effort that makes it happen.
reviews.title: Had it all

reviews.text: Stayed one night before a 6am flight. The room was large, clean and convenient. Beds were extremely comfortable. The rooms were surprisingly quiet. I would recommend this hotel for people using the airport or anyone for that matter. They had their own shuttle so it went directly to the airport and I made my flight on time.
reviews.title: Convenient and very close to airport

reviews.text: All you might ask for in a hotel - prompt polite service, clean, comfortable rooms rooms, fair price. If you are into hanging at the bar, this is not the place. You can get a drink, however. No problems and fast internet speed.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: We just returned from visiting our daughter and her family in Albany and stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn near the airport. It was excellent.
reviews.title: Albany Hilton Garden Inn.....Tip Top!

reviews.text: Clean, easy to locate, plenty of parking, cooked to order breakfast available and restaurant for evening meals too, pool, exercise room and computer room with printer.
reviews.title: Never leave anything of value in a hotel room.
Solid place to stay
reviews.text: No, it is not so close so you hear airport noise, so don't worry about that. It is also just 3/4 mile from Rt. 7 East and West.
We highly recommend this fine hotel.
reviews.title: Great Stay
Close, convenient, pretty location
reviews.text: The hotel is ridiculously close to the airport -- and yet, because the airport has less traffic than others, the airport noise is minimal to nothing. The hotel property is set in a wooded area, and there is a nearby paved trail that winds around and can eventually take you to a pond. A very easy walk - nice opportunity to stretch your legs. You can't escape the sound of traffic, but it beats walking on a treadmill.

Warning -- room 211 (and probably room 311, 411, etc) is pretty loud. The walls vibrate from noise from, it appears, both the ice maching and the hallway central air shafts. I thought about requesting a room change, it is that loud, but I am not even here for 12 hours so will just deal with it. I would certainly recommend avoiding these rooms if possible.
reviews.title: Perfect Airport Hotel

reviews.text: A nicely appointed hotel, all the way around. My room was very comfortable--and surprisingly for a place so near the airport, totally quiet--with fridge, microwave, tea/coffee, WiFi, nice amenities. In lieu of the seductive in-room mini-bar, there was a nice little shop in the lobby--convenient for a snack and a half-bottle of wine. Good restaurant, with excellent room service menu. The staff is very helpful and congenial. Check-in and Check-out was a breeze, and current airline flight info is posted in the lobby. Best of all, for someone like myself who had to catch a hideously early flight out of Albany, the hotel runs a 24-hour on-demand shuttle to the airport. This allowed me to return my rental car the night before, and save a few dollars (as well as grabbing a few extra minutes of sleep before my 3:30 a.m. wake-up call). All-round great experience, and great value.
reviews.title: Albany NY, Hilton Garden Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall stay was good, hotel is clean and well maintained. Only dislike was the breakfast, they should not charge for what is offered. Other hotels serve the same breakfast, if not better, and they do it for free.
reviews.title: Excellent Place To Stay

reviews.text: This hotel is very clean and comfortable. It has a shuttle to the Airport. A great restaurant in the hotel The staff was very helpful and friendly. The price was fair. I would definitely stay here again. Joan Schlaepfer
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel staff are very helpful and pleasant. Ended up eating there 5 nights. The food was great, bar and restaurant staff were all very nice. It is 5 minutes away for the Albany airport which is nice. Hotel shuttle will take you any time.
reviews.title: GREAT place to stay

reviews.text: The staff at the Albany Airport Hilton Garden Inn always make my stay so comfortable! Business travel can be stressful being away from home, etc but staying here always feels like a home away from home!
reviews.title: Home away from home!

reviews.text: I would recommend the hotel but do feel they need to compete with other hotels in offering a breakfast of some sort. The location was close to the airport and yet very quiet. The front staff was excellent and very friendly.
reviews.title: Albany, NY

reviews.text: I found the Hilton Garden Inn to be very convenient to the Airport. The staff was friendly and the room immaculate. The overall decor was also very nice. I would definitely stay there again if I was in the area.
reviews.title: Nice Airport Hotel

reviews.text: Beautiful, safe hotel in the heart of Troy. One of the very best Sport's Bars attached to the Hotel for a great evening experience. Nice breakfast with the best staff I have ever experienced in my travels. Book their catering for business or leisure and you will be treated like royalty. Clean, comfortable and spacious rooms.
reviews.title: World Class Service

reviews.text: You could practically walk to the airport if you had to but I did not hear one airplane rumble. How do they do that? The grounds are very pretty, the rooms are nice with comfortable beds and are clean, the staff is very friendly. A great choice if you need to be near the airport.
reviews.title: So convenient, friendly staff, lovely rooms.

reviews.text: The HGI is basically across the street from the airport but it does not have that airport hotel feeling or airport noise. I have stayed here in the past and have no complaints. There are plenty of dining options nearby on Route 7 or Wolf Road. Don't be confused by the Albany address provided by Hilton, you are not in downtown Albany, in fact I believe the hotel may be in Colonie or Latham. If you are using a GPS, don't worry about the street address simply enter the Albany Airport. You can see the Hotel from the road. Coming from the Interstate you will pass the terminal and the hotel is on the left.
reviews.title: Very Nice Aiport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So we returned our car early in advance of an early flight the next AM to Washington, DC, which means either ordering in, a cab ride to dine, or heavens NO eating at the captive hotel Resteraunt Chain - Amercan Grill. We gambled - had a lovely dinner here and were happy with ou chicken dish andsalmon selection with soup and salad. Both very good selections.
reviews.title: American Grill @ Hilton Garden Inn, Surprising Pleasure

reviews.text: This real should be a Resteraunt selection template my friends at TripAdvisor. The dining is open to the public. $$$
reviews.title: Nice return visit

reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn a few years ago. We like to stay at different places when we visit our daughter, but decided on a return to this spot. There were many upgrades since the last stay, and it was a very pleasant surpise. The new mattresses are adaptable firmness, the bathrooms were sparkling, the breakfast cooked to order was excellant. The front desk staff was extremely friendly and welcoming. A definate thumbs up.
reviews.title: Sick on the Road, and Hotel Comes Through

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Albany Airport Hotel
description: Come experience the exceptional service of the redesigned Hilton Garden Inn® Albany Airport. Our first class New York hotel is surrounded by the Adirondack Mountains and is just a half mile from the Albany International Airport. We offer our valued guests complimentary airport shuttle service and onsite parking. Whether you’re here for business, a wedding or a leisurely New York getaway, you’ll appreciate our ideal Albany location near area universities and New York youth sports venues. Guests staying at the Hilton Garden Inn Albany Airport Hotel also enjoy easy access to downtown Albany, the National Baseball Hall of Fame, Saratoga Race Course and Times Union Center.Our Albany airport hotel offers refreshed accommodations, warm hospitality and thoughtful amenities. The modern concept at our beautifully remodeled hotel includes private seating areas equipped with LCD TV's, an outdoor patio featuring a fire pit, a chic new restaurant with a one of a kind menu and a trendy lobby perfect for gathering with colleagues, friends and family. The Albany, New York Hilton Garden Inn creates an atmosphere perfect for business and leisure travelers alike.
